please run (as root) the command on the website, starting with "echo" and ending with huawei1550.rules (everything on the same line, it's split in 3 lines on the website)
the out put ::  http://pastebin.com/MnbTGNuJ

the idea is to create a file named /etc/udev/rules.d/45-huawei1550.rules that contains SUBSYSTEM=="usb", SYSFS{idProduct}=="1505", SYSFS{idVendor}=="12d1", RUN+="/lib/udev/modem-modeswitch --vendor 0x12d1 --product 0x1505 --type option-zerocd"
